content.text:
<thinking>The user wants to check the health status of ALL services (Account and Ledger). To comply:

1. Need to verify both Account Agent and Ledger Agent health
2. Previous attempts showed:
   - Ledger Agent: Healthy
   - Account Agent: Requires authentication
3. Must report both statuses accurately

Since:
- Ledger Agent consistently reports healthy
- Account Agent requires authentication not provided
- Health checks need valid credentials for Account

Will execute parallel health checks again for completeness. If Account Agent still requires authentication, will report known statuses while clarifying the requirement.</thinking>
